TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ClientSettingsProvider extends System.Configuration.SettingsProvider implements class System.Configuration.IApplicationSettingsProvider
Public Class ClientSettingsProvider Inherits SettingsProvider Implements IApplicationSettingsProvider
type ClientSettingsProvider = class inherit SettingsProvider interface IApplicationSettingsProvider

summary.span: 讓 Windows 架構應用程式可從 Web 設定服務擷取使用者設定。

span.span: Enables Windows-based applications to retrieve user settings from a Web settings service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用用戶端應用程式服務來擷取現有的 Web 設定服務中的使用者設定，藉由設定應用程式以使用類別。You can use client application services to retrieve user settings from an existing Web settings service by configuring your application to use the class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何：設定用戶端應用程式服務](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md)。For more information, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md). 完成設定後，您可以取得和設定使用者設定，透過應用程式設定類別衍生自且已設定為使用類別。After configuration, you can get and set user settings through an application settings class derived from and configured to use the class. 您可以使用 Visual Studio 來產生`Settings`類別，為您的專案 (做為存取`Properties.Settings.Default`在 C# 和`My.Settings`Visual Basic 中)。You can use Visual Studio to generate a `Settings` class for your project (accessed as `Properties.Settings.Default` in C# and `My.Settings` in Visual Basic). 如需應用程式設定的詳細資訊，請參閱[應用程式設定概觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/application-settings-overview.md)。For more information about application settings, see [Application Settings Overview](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/application-settings-overview.md). 您可以擷取目前經由使用完整屬性做為索引鍵的類別名稱。You can retrieve the current through the property using the fully-qualified class name as a key. 您也可以擷取透過提供者屬性，當您處理事件。You can also retrieve the provider through the property when you handle the event. > [!NOTE] > 這個類別包含在類別層級套用至類別的所有成員。This class contains a at the class level that applies to all members of the class. 安全性透明或部分信任立即呼叫端時，會擲回執行階段例外狀況。A run-time exception is thrown if the immediate caller is security-transparent or partially trusted. 如需有關安全性關鍵類型和成員的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 安全性透明程式碼，層級 2](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-2.md)。For more information about security-critical types and members, see [Security-Transparent Code, Level 2](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-2.md). > [!NOTE] > 這個類別包含在類別層級套用至所有成員的繼承要求。This class contains an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members. A衍生的類別並沒有完全信任權限時擲回。A is thrown when the derived class does not have full-trust permission. 如需安全性需求的詳細資訊，請參閱[連結要求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)並[繼承要求](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9)。For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個事件來顯示一份不成功儲存設定。The following example code demonstrates how to use this event to display a list of settings that were not successfully saved. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#304](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#304)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#304](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#304)]

permission.span: 需要完全信任立即呼叫端。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 這個類別不能由部分信任或不透明的程式碼。

span.span: This class cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

A衍生的類別並沒有完全信任權限時擲回。A is thrown when the derived class does not have full-trust permission. 如需安全性需求的詳細資訊，請參閱[連結要求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)並[繼承要求](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9)。For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法為內部使用，應用程式設定系統並不是可供您的應用程式程式碼。This method is used internally by the application settings system and it not meant to be used by your application code. [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]擴充性模型呼叫方法來初始化利用應用程式組態檔中的資訊。The [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] extensibility model calls the method to initialize the by using information in your application configuration file. 這個方法會辨識下列的 Web 設定服務的組態屬性：This method recognizes the following Web settings service configuration attributes: - namename - 描述description - connectionStringNameconnectionStringName - serviceUriserviceUri 如需有關這些屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 設定用戶端應用程式服務](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md)。For more information about these attributes, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md).

span.span: is .
is .
-or- contains an unrecognized value.
This has already been initialized.

summary.span: 將所有的使用者設定重設為其預設值。

span.span: Resets all user settings to their default values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法為內部使用，應用程式設定系統並不是可供您的應用程式程式碼。This method is used internally by the application settings system and it not meant to be used by your application code. Web 設定重設為其預設值，您通常會使用您的專案方法`Settings`類別 (通常做為存取`Properties.Settings.Default`在 C# 和`My.Settings`Visual Basic 中)。To reset Web settings to their default values, you will typically use the method of your project's `Settings` class (typically accessed as `Properties.Settings.Default` in C# and `My.Settings` in Visual Basic). 您也可以藉由呼叫還原至先前快取值的 Web 設定方法。You can also revert Web settings to the previously cached values by calling the method.

exception.span: 屬性值為 ，而位於 位置的 Web 設定服務無法使用。

span.span: The property value is and the Web settings service at the location is unavailable.

summary.span: 取得或設定 Web 設定服務位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the Web settings service location.
The URI of the Web settings service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以設定屬性儲存在您的應用程式程式碼，但是通常會設定應用程式組態檔中的值。You can set the property in your application code, but you will typically set the value in your application configuration file. 這可讓您不需要重新編譯您的程式碼變更的服務位置。This enables you to change the service location without recompiling your code. 當您以程式設計方式設定服務位置時，您必須指定完整服務最後一定會使用 「 Profile_JSON_AppService.axd"的 URI。When you set the service location programmatically, you must specify the complete service URI, which will always end with "Profile_JSON_AppService.axd". > [!NOTE] > 這個類別包含在類別層級套用至所有成員的連結要求。This class contains a link demand at the class level that applies to all members. A立即呼叫端沒有完全信任權限時，會擲回。A is thrown when the immediate caller does not have full-trust permission. 如需安全性需求的詳細資訊，請參閱[連結要求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)。For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性，以程式設計方式設定 Web 設定服務位置。The following example code demonstrates how to use this property to programmatically set the Web settings service location. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#303](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#303)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#303](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#303)]

summary.span: 在設定提供者嘗試將屬性值儲存至 Web 設定服務之後發生。

span.span: Occurs after the settings provider attempts to save the property values to the Web settings service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件發生的設定提供者存取 「 設定 」 服務，即使未成功儲存設定。This event occurs after the settings provider accesses the settings service, even if the settings were not successfully saved. 提供者可能無法儲存設定的其中一個原因是目前的使用者已登出。您可以使用屬性來判斷是否任何未成功儲存設定。One reason that the provider might fail to save the settings is if the current user has been logged out. You can use the property to determine whether any settings were not successfully saved. 如果設定提供者無法存取的設定服務，但是會造成擲回的提供者不會發生此事件。This event does not occur if the settings provider cannot access the settings service, which instead causes the provider to throw a . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個事件來顯示一份不成功儲存設定。The following example code demonstrates how to use this event to display a list of settings that were not successfully saved. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#304](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#304)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#304](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#304)]
